name: Crunchyroll - Depremiumize | Premium Removal
description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. ― Crunchyroll - Depremiumize or "Premium Removal" will remove anything related to premium membership; such as contents nagging you to try it, or to buy it! Anything that require a premium membership will be hidden, deleted from the site. From buttons in 720P, 1080P, to log-ins, sign-ups, banners, menus, links and more. If you're already a premium member, you obliviously don't need this style. ― Version: 1.0.0 | View change logs

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info: IMPORTANT: For bug reports, please use Twitter and send me a tweet or a direct message with the link of your issue after posting it in the discussions down below! I don't receive any notifications when somebody is using the Discussions/Feedback button. Depremiumize© ― A word which did not exist until now... it's mine! I copyrighted it! Find your own! D: This style was created because I got tired of seeing premium banners and stuff all over the place. I do not use it, I do not need it and I do not really care. I am sure it's the same thing for a lot of people. So I decided it was time to get rid of all of those things once and for all. This style will remove; - The premium button from the navigator on top of the page. - The video quality buttons for 720P and 1080P because they require premium. - The free trial module on the right sidebar next to the video. - The premium availability in the video description. - The premium upgrade link on your profile summary. - The premium gift link under your display picture. - The premium crown next to your friends and guests display pictures. - The premium crown next to the display pictures of other users in the comments section. - The premium upgrade link from the video category.
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.crunchyroll.com") {

#slidebox, 
#adblocker_message, 
#header_container .premium, 
#showmedia_free_trial_signup, 
#sidebar a[href*='freetrial'], 
.video-quality [title='720P'], 
.video-quality [title='1080P'], 
.video-quality a[href*='noads'], 
#header_menubar_beta li a[href*='freetrial'], 
.user-profile-personal-info tr:nth-child(1), 
#allCommentsList img[title='Premium Member'], 
.user-profile-box img[title='Premium Member'], 
#user_profile_links a[href*='freetrial'] { 
display: none !important; 
}

}
